Summary: Large bright ball of light appeared in the sky, then dropped to Earth.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around March 21st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAround 2am on March 21, 2008, my sister and I were driving on 495 north near the Milford exit and in front of us in the sky appeared a very large ball of light that seemed to have some sort of darker "core". It hung there for a few seconds and then fell in a slightly wavering line towards the ground. In terms of size, if a normal shooting star (which this is defintiely not) were the size of a golf ball, what we saw would be equivalent to a basketball. At the time we were the only car on the highway that we could see. We both immediately fell silent and after a few more seconds both expressed total astonishment at what we'd seen. We both independently described it as looking as if the object had "popped" into the atmosphere from outer space and then fell to Earth.
